data.name: 异世界的无厘头生活-H版
data.detailed_description:
This DLC has many color scenarios

DLC is about a world where you were sent to after you died

The story of collecting holy water from all kinds of girls



As long as you answer the right questions, you will enter plot h to complete the task

If you answer the wrong question, you will die for no reason



After collecting the holy water, the story will be continued in the nonsense life of different worlds

  • Processor: Intel Core i3

  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 1111 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
  • Additional Notes:
